name: Spike Spectere
description:
In this puzzle platformer, when you die you become a cute ghost which can fly about and interact with objects. however, you cannot complete the level as a spectere....

This game took part in the *clears throat*  WOWIIEEE! game jam. How it fits the theme: Failure (dying) allows you to become a ghost which can do things in the level to help you progress.

sorry about my dodgy GUIs in advance.

[CONTROLS]

WASD/Arrow Keys

R reset

T skip

ESC menu
